document.heading: Defined Contribution Plan Modifications for the Director of the Department of Corrections Devon Brown Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-260, the “Defined Contribution Plan Modifications for the Director of the Department of Corrections Devon Brown Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-667 which was referred to the Committee Public Safety and Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 15, 2008, and September 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on September 29, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-511 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-260 became effective on November 19, 2008.
